https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zqYwgBTGozm0bqk4rV0rrZsZciu.jpg 1923. In the heart of an old English college, Edward Williams receives an engraving of of an unknown country house with an imposing facade, a sweeping lawn - and, just perhaps, something else. A Ghost Story for Christmas: The Mezzotint
